metadata.title: CVE-2024-57908 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  iio: imu: kmx61: fix information leak in triggered buffer  The 'buffer' local array is used to push data to user space from a triggered buffer, but it does not set values for inactive channels, as it only uses iio_for_each_active_channel() to assign new values.  Initialize the array to zero before using it to avoid pushing uninitialized information to userspace.
